snippet: Makerbot, a Brooklyn-based start-up that builds 3-D printers announced its latest offering on Tuesday, the MakerBot Replicator. The new 3-D printer can make larger objects than the company's previous 3-D printers.
abstract: Makerbot, a Brooklyn-based start-up that builds 3-D printers announced its latest offering on Tuesday, the MakerBot Replicator. The new 3-D printer can make larger objects than the company's previous 3-D printers.
lead_paragraph: Three-dimensional printing is getting more sophisticated. Makerbot, a Brooklyn-based start-up that builds 3-D printers for the consumer market, announced its latest offering on Tuesday, the MakerBot Replicator.
